title: Lavanya Kangan Set: Floral Vine Bangles with Sparkling Zirconias
materials: 22K Gold Plated Base Metal with High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Finished with a signature Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine and vibrancy.
features: Inspired by nature, the Lavanya Kangan showcases a delicate floral vine design. Each bangle features intricate detailing with CZs that create a shimmering effect. The lightweight design ensures comfortable all-day wear, while the floral motif adds a touch of traditional elegance.
colors: Lustrous Gold with dazzling White Cubic Zirconia.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. These bangles add a touch of sparkle to any outfit.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary style. The durable gold plating ensures long-lasting shine, while the floral design symbolizes growth and prosperity. A versatile piece that can be dressed up or down.
